message.content:
1. Regression analyses were conducted.
2. Caregivers were divided into an experimental group.
3. The experimental group caregivers showed significantly lower symptoms of depression post intervention.
4. The p-value for the decrease in depression symptoms was .034.
5. The experimental group caregivers showed significantly lower symptoms of anxiety post intervention.
6. The p-value for the decrease in anxiety symptoms was .007.
7. The results were adjusted for baseline differences in the primary outcome scores.
8. The results were also adjusted for the functional status of the patients with dementia.

messages.content:
Statement: Regression analyses showed that caregivers in the experimental group showed significantly lower symptoms of depression (p = .034) and anxiety (p = .007) post intervention after adjustment for baseline differences in the primary outcome scores and the functional status of the patients with dementia.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
